ygData.subject: Re: Welcome to warriors_eq@onelist.com
ygData.msgSnippet: Bloodstone rings are non-magical, basically just jewlrey, and to my knowledge they can not be enchanted. Salr D Taynkk Dark Warrior of The Kith Veeshan
ygData.messageBody:
Bloodstone rings are non-magical, basically just jewlrey, and to my
knowledge they can not be enchanted.

Salr D'Taynkk
Dark Warrior of The Kith
Veeshan

> -----Original Message-----
> From: James [mailto:manickd@...]
> Sent: Sunday, May 16, 1999 7:39 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Welcome to warriors_eq@onelist.com
>
>
> From: "James" <manickd@...>
>
> Hi I am new to this list. My char name is Sanerien on the
> Innoruuk servrer.
> Just wanted you to know I am out here.
>
> P.S. does any one know any stats on blood stone rings? Do they work or do
> they need to be enchanted to work? Also I am looking for a good quality 2
> hand slashing weapon for a level 8 char. Where can I get one for a good
> price? and what sugestion do you give that I should get, but so you know I
> have my heart set on a 2 hand slashing so pleas dont try to convince me
> other wise. :P~~~
>
